description: Aggressive low-end lift across the sub-bass and mid-bass frequencies for maximum rumble and punch, while retaining some clarity in the highs.

bands.notes: Maximum boost for sub-bass rumble and physical feeling (requires good speakers/subwoofer).
Strong boost for mid-bass punch, kick drum impact, and overall bass loudness.
Moderate boost to add thick body and fullness to the bassline and low instruments.
Small lift to maintain warmth and transition smoothly into the midrange.
Neutral or slightly reduced to prevent the boosted low end from making the sound 'muddy' or 'boomy'.
Slight cut to scoop the mids, contrasting the heavy bass boost.
Neutral, focusing attention on the boosted low and high ends.
Small lift for overall instrumental clarity (attack).
Moderate boost for high-end sparkle and definition to contrast the heavy bass.
Small boost for 'air' and high-frequency extension.
